description: An HR Tech startup that is developing the next generation of recruitment and finding a job system.We are looking for a Front-end developer to build several web applications.The job is open for new or inexperienced developers as well.The system deck is using a React/Redux, JavaScript, Node.js backend with MongoDB, PostgreSQL and Redis DBs.Need a skilled developer who has experience in creating material UI designed React/Redux webpages with API connections.Must have experience developing with React/Redux and APIs.Need to know how to work with Bitbucket and CircleCI/Cypress CI/CD auto testing systems.Development tasks are managed with Jetbrain YouTrack system.Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, VolunteerShow more Report

למה כדאי לך להצטרף לצוות שלנו?

כבר שנים ארוכות שאנחנו מובילים בתחום אחסון אתרי הוורדפרס, וזו יכולה להיות הזדמנות נהדרת עבורך להצטרף לצוות המנצח שלנו, אם אתה עדיין לא מכיר אותנו, אז הגיע הזמן.
אנחנו צוות של אנשי אבטחה, מנהלי רשתות, מפתחים, מעצבים, אנליסטים, מאפייני UX/UI, אנשי שירות ומכירות. שעושים את ה-כ-ל בשביל לספק ללקוחתינו את הטכנולוגיה המתקדמת ביותר ופורצת הדרך שלנו, עטופה היטב בשירות ברמה הגבוהה ביותר כאשר המטרה שעומדת כל הזמן לנגד עינינו היא להמשיך להוביל ולפתח את עולמות האחסון בוורדפרס..

ביופרס העובדים מרגישים שהם שייכים לצוות איכותי של אנשים שפועל יחדיו עם המון .תמיכה וחופש ליצירתיות, לביטוי עצמי ולהשפעה עצומה על מגוון רחב של תחומים
כחלק מהתפיסה הארגונית שלנו אנחנו שמים את העובד במרכז ומאירים דגש מיוחד על התפתחות אישית, צמיחה מקצועית ורכישת ידע, עיצוב קריירה אישית שמניבה פירות וסביבת עבודה נוחה ומשפחתית שמסייעת לכל עובד.

אם אתה מחפש הזדמנות להצטרף לחברה עם אפשרויות קידום אדירות ורצון להוביל,להצליח, לפתח ולשנות את עולם הוורדפרס בישראל ובעולם . מקומך איתנו.

מה אנחנו מחפשים?

אנו מחפשים מפתח מוכשר עם תשוקה לחשיבה מחוץ לקופסא, שישפיע רבות על העסק שלנו.
אנחנו מחפשים מישהו שיעזור לנו לתחזק את עשרות המערכות שפיתחנו, לפתח מערכות חדשות, מישהו עם ראש גדול שיודע לעבוד בצוות, להיות שותף ביצירה ולשתף מידע.

מה אנחנו מצפים ממך?
בניית קוד יעיל, ניתן לבדיקה וניתן לשימוש חוזר
תרגום דרישות בכתב לתכונות הפועלות במלואן
נסיון מוכח של שנתיים בפיתוח Front-end – חובה
ניסיון מוכח עם JavaScript (כולל ES6), CSS3, HTML5 – חובה
שימוש בטכנולוגיות מגוונות עם דגש על React \ Angular – יתרון
יכולות עיצוב ארכיטקטוריות חזקות
זיהוי ופתרון בעיות שונות ובעיות קידוד
אנגלית כתובה ומדוברת ברמת שפת אם

אנחנו אוהבים אנשים שחושבים בגדול ויודעים לעבוד בצוות, שמאמינים במטרה שלנו לבנות חברה ייחודית רבת השפעה לטווח ארוך עם מערכת ששואפת לאוטומציה מלאה.

פרטי המשרה?

העבודה הינה במשרה מלאה במשרדי החברה.
המשרה פונה לגברים ולנשים כאחד וכתובה בלשון זכר מטעמי נוחות בלבד.
שלח לנו קורות חיים לדואר אלקטרוני hr@upress.co.il עם הכותרת "Front-end Developer"

פרטים שחשוב לנו לדעת עליך
מקום מגוריך הנוכחי?
תאריך תחילת עבודה מבחינתך
פירוט הניסיון המקצועי שלך
ציפייות שכר (בשקלים ברוטו)
אתר אינטרנט, בלוג, פרופיל מדיה החברתיתShow more Report

Unleash is powering the productivity revolution by providing users with a centralized way to search through their cloud based apps and local desktop. A light weight search interface allows users to enter their search query and receive relevant ranked results which are yielded in seconds.

As a user centric company, we place a great deal of emphasis on users experience when building our product and have fun doing it!
﻿
We are a fresh and energetic startup, post round A in funding ($12M), led by a strong team of second timer founders and top angel investors and VCs from the Sillicon Valley and Tel Aviv. Our expanding team is made up of enthusiastic and dedicated members working together to revolutionize the productivity world. We believe that collaboration across teams - where everyone is accessible, from our newest hires to the founders - combined with a vested interest in our teams well being are the keys to our successful working environment.
﻿We are looking for a Front End Developer to be part of the application lifecycle from design phase to production and bug resolving. In addition, the role requires the development and engineering of all client related components of our product including desktop application, mobile web app and every client facing alternative that will be defined.
﻿
Your main responsibilities will include:

Design and plan features that will be defined by the Product Team
Developing smooth and efficient code
Collaborate with Back-end Engineers / DevOps Engineers / QA Engineer / Product Managers
Stay up to date with current best practices
Provide training, help and support to other team members
Perform code reviews for colleagues and team members
Be aware of security concerns and resolve issues
Mitigate production incidents

If you are a bright, pro-active, ambitious and naturally curious person who shares our value of teamwork and hold these skills, send us your CV!Report

At TOMODO, every developer is familiar with our entire system. As a front end developer, you will be working on many different projects and challenges simultaneously. You'll build a friendly, cloud based, development environment. Handle cross browsers and cross third party services while mastering dynamic code injections. In addition you'll master the art of performance and scale in ways web developers rarely get to see.
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in web client development (JavaScript + HTML + CSS3).
Must be familiar with server-side technologies (preferably Python / Ruby).
Advanced HTML & CSS skills, cross browser experience.
Self-learner with the ability to see a project through from A to Z.
Hacker / BSc / MSc in computer science or related fields / contributor to open source projects
Passionate about technology and the web.
AWS experience - a significant advantage.
Contact us at: hireme@tomodo.comShow more Report

We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming to join a well-financed, energetic startup-like publicly traded company, led by experienced and well-reputed entrepreneurs in the blockchain-crypto space is. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
Responsibilities
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Skills And Qualifications
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Good understanding of advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks, such as AngularJS, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, ReactJS, DurandalJS etc.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git / Mercurial / SVN
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them.Report

About Hello Heart:

Hello Heart is the only digital therapeutics company to focus exclusively on heart disease, the leading cause of death for U.S. adults. Through a connected device and mobile app that uses AI, behavioral science, and personalized digital coaching to drive lifestyle changes, Hello Heart empowers people to embrace healthier behavior, which can reduce the risks of high blood pressure and heart disease. It also helps users catch blood pressure readings that are extremely high and encourages them to talk to their doctor to identify potential risk in time. Validated in peer-reviewed studies and trusted by leading Fortune 500 companies, Hello Heart is easy to use and works alongside an employer's benefits ecosystem. Founded in 2013, Hello Heart is a member of the American Heart Association's Innovators' Network and is part of the CVS Health Point Solutions Management program. Hello Heart is backed by leading VCs including Stripes, Khosla Ventures, IVP, Blue Run and Resolute. Visit www.helloheart.com for more information.
About the role:

We are looking for an intellectually curious Front End Engineer who is passionate about code, high performance and cares about quality. You will work with knowledgeable and experienced developers with a large scale of skills and capabilities who are passionate about developing an innovative product which makes an impact.

The position includes working closely with the Product, Design and Data Science teams, taking full ownership of your work from conception to post-deployment, while continuously learning and evaluating cutting edge technologies in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.

Our Technologies stack: React Native, Redux, React JS, Scala, Play, Microservices, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, MongoDB, Redis, Postgres, Spark, Elasticsearch, Kafka, and more.

Responsibility:

Develop code that is used daily around the world and actually saves lives!
Work with our data science team on implementing their algorithms into our new and upcoming data driven solutions.
Collaborate with Product Managers, Experience Designers and Data Engineers on all aspects of product development: strategy, brainstorming, user research, design, execution, AB testing, and iteration.
Take part in making a major difference in our team and influence our technology stack.
Join a great team of people passionate about technology and doing good to the world.

Qualifications:

4+ years of professional experience as a front end focused developer but experience with full stack, preferable React Native.
BS degree in Computer Science or similar, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience in one of the following: Scala, Java, Ruby, Python, Go.
Experience with databases Postgres, MongoDB, etc - Advantage.
Familiar with cloud-based deployment: AWS, Docker, Serverless, etc - Advantage
